name: Finger Ninja
description: Keyboard simulator performed in the form of an exciting game with a pleasant musical accompaniment. Train your fingers in the skills of blind typing playing an interesting game. Prove the virtuosity of your fingers by going through many different levels from the simplest to the most incredibly complex.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP \ 7 Processor: Dual Core 2.4 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 1 GB video card memory Storage: 500 MB available space
